name: Ichi-Robo ( Ludum Dare 45 )
description:
Ichi-Robo was created for Ludum Dare 45 with @Pilsef

Welcome to the Robo training facility – a training ground for newly created Robos to learn the basics of Robo behavior. Each Robo is installed with a special module that allows them to move left, right, and… What!?!? Our funding was cut and they came installed with nothing?!

Well then, I guess it’s up to you to train them, one module at a time.

By taking on this task, you are ensuring that these Robos will help make the world a better place with their little cute faces. Thank you, and have a pleasant day.

P.S. Watch out for the warp doors! Whooooaaaaa~

Made in 72 hours by Kevin Otoshi & Willem Jager for Ludum Dare 45.
